subject: Hockey, Field
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Tiffany Snow scored her fifth goal of an Olympic qualifying tournament as the United States remained undefeated with a 3-1 victory against the Netherlands Antilles in Kazan, Russia. The Americans (5-0) face Belgium (3-1-1) in the championship Sunday.
